hanzi-su-wiki:
試

Значения

Пробовать, проверять, пытаться; испытывать; экзамен, сопоставлять (с оригиналом)

Мнемоника

  • Стандартная 式 речь 言 — проверка знания классических текстов при получении учёной степени.

  • На церемонии 式:
    "Будете ли вы с ним всю жизнь?"
    Я сказала 言:
    "Я попытаюсь."

Варианты

试

тестировать; пытаться; эксперимент; экспертиза; тест

• ⿰ Left to right

heisig_chinese_memo: In an essay test, you are judged on both your choice of words and your writing style.
heisig_constituent: test, say, words, keitai, mouth, style, arrow, craft
heisig_story: When a manufacturer produces a new style for the market, the first thing that is done is to run a test on consumers, asking them to speak their opinions frankly about the product. Never mind the anachronism (the kanji was there well before our capitalistic market system) if it helps you remember.

расскажи о своём искусстве
koohiiStory1: In an essay test, you are judged on both your choice of words and your writing style.
koohiiStory2: The Japanese oral exam was a test of my speaking style.
jp_example_words:
試み(こころみ): trial, experiment
試みる(こころみる): to try, to test
試し(ためし): trial, test
試す(ためす): attempt, test
試合(しあい): game
試験(しけん): examination
jp_readingExamples: 試みる (こころ.みる), 試す (ため.す)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you want to say something at a ceremony for construction workers you're going to have to try really hard. Construction is loud, so if you want to be heard you have to attempt to be louder than the drilling and smashing and digging and handing out of awards.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Try to imagine trying this hard to be heard. The construction workers are all screaming at each other with ease. It's so hard for you to try and keep up with their volume!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You try to get their attention the only way you know how, by lifting a sheep (し) above your head. The sheep baas and suddenly everything is silent, all eyes are on you. Well, they're on the sheep.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Huh. You should have thought to try this sheep technique earlier.
Ru_Radicals: 工 (техника), 弋 (стрела с бечевой), 言 (слово)
Ru_trainchinese: shì: (глаг) пробовать, примерять; испытывать, экзаменовать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the words (言) of the ceremony (式) test you
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When buying a new style of clothes I test them by trying them on and seeing what my friends say.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " speak " and " style " sound, the original meaning is use and appointment. "Shuowen": "Use also. From words, style sound." "Book of Rites-缁衣": "Zi said: Good virtuous is like "Bao Yi", 惡惡 like "Xiang Bo", then noble but the people do I hope that the sentence will not be tried, but the people will serve it." Zheng Xuan's note: "Try, use it."

" Try " can mean trying. "Yi‧Wuwang": "A medicine without a delusion cannot be tried."

" Test " can also mean test. "Shu-Shun Dian": "Follow the performance with words, test with merit, and car suit with mediocrity." Kong Chuan: "The four dynasties of the princes, each made Chen Jin rule the words of rituals, test his words clearly in order to obtain their merits and success. Then give the car uniform to show its usefulness."

" Try " can also mean temptation. "Han Feizi·Yangquan": "Hidden his own privates under the hood, try to use them." It means that the courtiers conceal their treacherous personalities to test the king.

" Examination " can specifically refer to the imperial examination. Tang Hanyu's "Mr. Zhenyao's Epitaph": "When I was a few fifty years old, I began to gather the masters of the capital with the order of my wife. After the examination for Jinshi, I will go immediately."

" Try " can also be used as an adverb, which is equivalent to "tentatively" and "try." Han Dongfang Shuo's "On Mr. Non-Yu": "Mr. try to say, the widow will see it."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " word " and " style ", the original meaning is use and appointment.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「式」聲，本義為使用、任用。《說文》：「用也。从言，式聲。」《禮記‧緇衣》：「子曰：好賢如〈緇衣〉，惡惡如〈巷伯〉，則爵不瀆而民作愿，刑不試而民咸服。」鄭玄注：「試，用也。」

　　「試」可表示嘗試。《易‧無妄》：「無妄之藥，不可試也。」

　　「試」也可表示檢驗。《書‧舜典》：「敷奏以言，明試以功，車服以庸。」孔傳：「諸侯四朝，各使陳進治禮之言，明試其言以要其功，功成則賜車服以表顯其能用。」

　　「試」還可表示試探。《韓非子‧揚權》：「下匿其私，用試其上。」意謂臣子隱藏姦私來試探君上。

　　「試」可特指科舉考試，唐韓愈〈貞曜先生墓志銘〉：「年幾五十，始以尊夫人之命來集京師，從進士試，既得，即去。」

　　「試」亦可用作副詞，相當於「姑且」、「試着」。漢東方朔〈非有先生論〉：「先生試言，寡人將覽焉。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「式」聲，本義為使用、任用。

從「 言 」，「 式 」聲，本義為使用、任用。《說文》：「用也。从言，式聲。」《禮記‧緇衣》：「子曰：好賢如〈緇衣〉，惡惡如〈巷伯〉，則爵不瀆而民作愿，刑不試而民咸服。」鄭玄注：「試，用也。」 「 試 」可表示嘗試。《易‧無妄》：「無妄之藥，不可試也。」 「 試 」也可表示檢驗。《書‧舜典》：「敷奏以言，明試以功，車服以庸。」孔傳：「諸侯四朝，各使陳進治禮之言，明試其言以要其功，功成則賜車服以表顯其能用。」 「 試 」還可表示試探。《韓非子‧揚權》：「下匿其私，用試其上。」意謂臣子隱藏姦私來試探君上。 「 試 」可特指科舉考試，唐韓愈〈貞曜先生墓志銘〉：「年幾五十，始以尊夫人之命來集京師，從進士試，既得，即去。」 「 試 」亦可用作副詞，相當於「姑且」、「試着」。漢東方朔〈非有先生論〉：「先生試言，寡人將覽焉。」
From " speak" and " style" sound, the original meaning is use and appointment. "Shuowen": "Use also. From words, style sound." "Book of Rites-缁衣": "Zi said: Good virtuous is like "Bao Yi", 惡惡 like "Xiang Bo", then noble but the people do I hope that the sentence will not be tried, but the people will serve it." Zheng Xuan's note: "Try, use it." " Try" can mean trying. "Yi‧Wuwang": "A medicine without a delusion cannot be tried." " Test" can also mean test. "Shu-Shun Dian": "Follow the performance with words, test with merit, and car suit with mediocrity." Kong Chuan: "The four dynasties of the princes, each made Chen Jin rule the words of rituals, test his words clearly in order to obtain their merits and success. Then give the car uniform to show its usefulness." " Try" can also mean temptation. "Han Feizi·Yangquan": "Hidden his own privates under the hood, try to use them." It means that the courtiers conceal their treacherous personalities to test the king. " Examination" can specifically refer to the imperial examination. Tang Hanyu's "Mr. Zhenyao's Epitaph": "When I was a few fifty years old, I began to gather the masters of the capital with the order of my wife. After the examination for Jinshi, I will go immediately." " Try" can also be used as an adverb, which is equivalent to "tentatively" and "try." Han Dongfang Shuo's "On Mr. Non-Yu": "Mr. try to say, the widow will see it."

試字的基本解释

試
shì
见“试”。

試字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《廣韻》式吏切，去志，書。］
“试1”的繁体字。
(1)任用；使用；运用。
(2)指初次使用。
(3)泛指初、始。参见“試花。”
(4)尝试。
(5)试探。
(6)检验，检试。
(7)比试；考较。
(8)考查、测验知识或技能。
(9)特指科举考试。
(10)训练。
(11)经历。
(12)冒犯；触。
(13)唐宋官制之一。唐制，担任某一官职，但无正式任命，称为“試”。宋代任职低于阶官名衔二等，称为“試”。
(14)见“試試縮縮”。
(15)副词。相当于“姑且”、“試着”。
(16)通“弒”。
(17)通“識”。懂得。

試字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　試； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1157第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?式吏切，詩去聲。【說文】用也。【博雅】嘗也。【增韻】探也，較也。【易·无妄】无妄之藥，不可試也。【釋文】試驗，一曰用也。【註】試，謂少嘗之也。【書·舜典】明試以功。【禮·緇衣】?不試而民咸服。【莊子·齊物論】嘗試言之。　又【正韻】式至切，音翅。義同。　又姓，見【姓苑】。　又【集韻】設職切，音識。義同。通作式。　又叶詩止切，音始。【詩·小雅】方叔涖止，其車三千，師干之試。試叶止。　又叶申之切，音詩。【詩·小雅】私人之子，百僚是試。叶上裘，裘音渠之反。

暂无。

test
Basic explanation of words
test
shì
See "Try".
test
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shì］
["Guangyun" style official cut, go to record, book. ]
"Try 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Appointment; use; use.
(2) Refers to the initial use.
(3) Refers to the beginning and the beginning in general. See "Trial Flower."
(4) Try.
(5) Test.
(6) Inspection, inspection.
(7) Contest; test.
(8) Examine and test knowledge or skills.
(9) Specifically refers to the imperial examination.
(10) Training.
(11) Experience.
(12) Offense; touch.
(13) One of Tang and Song official system. Tang system, holding a certain official position, but without formal appointment, is called "examination". In the Song dynasty, the post was lower than the second-class official title, which was called "examination".
(14) See "Try shrinking".
(15) Adverbs. It is equivalent to "tentatively" and "trying".
(16) Through "killing".
(17) Through "knowledge". know.
test
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　Exam; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1157 No. 03
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? The style is cut, and the poem is gone. [Said the text] It is also useful. [Bo Ya] Taste it. [Zeng Yun] Exploring and comparing. 【Yi·Wuwang】The medicine without deception is not to be tried. 【Explanation】Experiment, use it for one thing. [Note] Try it, it’s better to taste less. 【Book·Shun Code】Mentally try to gain merit. 【Rite·Clothes】? Don't try, but people will be served salty. [Zhuangzi·Qiwulun] Try to say it.　 [Zheng Yun] style to cut, sound wings. The same meaning.　Another surname, see [Surname Garden].　[Jiyun] Set up job cuts, sound knowledge. The same meaning. General style.　Ye Shi stopped cutting, and the sound began. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Uncle Fang stopped here, and his car was three thousand, and the teacher tried it out. Try Ye Zhi.　 Ye Shenzhi cut again, sound poem. [Poetry·Xiaoya] The son of a private person, a hundred officials are a test. Ye Shangqiu is the opposite of Qiu Yinqu.

shì
вм. 试

試

Значения

Пробовать, проверять, пытаться; испытывать; экзамен, сопоставлять (с оригиналом)

Мнемоника

  • Стандартная 式 речь 言 — проверка знания классических текстов при получении учёной степени.

  • На церемонии 式:
    "Будете ли вы с ним всю жизнь?"
    Я сказала 言:
    "Я попытаюсь."

Варианты

试

Radicals: 言, 弋, 工  (say, ceremony, construction)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you want to say something at a ceremony for construction workers you're going to have to try really hard. Construction is loud, so if you want to be heard you have to attempt to be louder than the drilling and smashing and digging and handing out of awards.
Try to imagine trying this hard to be heard. The construction workers are all screaming at each other with ease. It's so hard for you to try and keep up with their volume!
Reading Mnemonic
You try to get their attention the only way you know how, by lifting a sheep (し) above your head. The sheep baas and suddenly everything is silent, all eyes are on you. Well, they're on the sheep.
Huh. You should have thought to try this sheep technique earlier.
